# init(_:_:)

**Initializer**

Creates a transformer composition from two transformers.

## Declaration

```swift
init(_ inner: Inner, _ outer: Outer)
```

## Parameters

- **inner**: The inner transformer.
- **outer**: The outer transformer.
title: init(_:_:)
